name: Supermarket Mania (itch)
description:
Control: Use WASD to move, E to interact

Your city is in a lockdown! Hurry up! Gather the necessities to survive the lockdown!

Known Issues:

- Item collection sometimes does not work

- Merchandise value might be unfair (did not test)

- Random spawned item might not be enough to surpass required level

- Does not have a win condition, infinite level 

Authors:

Haotian Lu (Programming, Techart)

Yonghe Mu (Design)

Yifan Zhang (Design, programming)

Yi Zhao (Art)
